8/8 gr8 m8.  Awesome game.  Surfing is bliss, graphics are nice.  Not heavy on system at all, you can play this on just about anything.  I would know, I'm playing on a Chromebook booted with Ubuntu and that's basically the worst machine you can get.

Better than csgo!!!!  I love this game even though i have only played this game for 8 hours. I love the way you can change the looks of weapons with mods and make the game look so much different and even if you get bored theres still so much to entertain you for hours at a time. Really worth the ¬£14.99

In CS:S, graphics improved, that's cool. Gameplay didn't change, not that surprising. But the one thing that I really appreciate is that the grenades no longer look like old rusty cans that look like they hold expired beans.
